product_name: Sea to Summit Insect Shield Bug Pants and Socks
long_description: Sea To Summit Insect Shield(R) Bug pants and socks create a barrier to block biting insects so you can enjoy all your outdoor activities. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel helps keep biting and potentially disease-carrying insects at bay. Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel is effective through 70 washes. Fine polyester no-see-um mesh is lightweight and compact. Adjustable cuffs and waist allow for a comfortable fit. Included storage pouch makes for easy transportation. Generous cut lets you wear the pants and socks over other clothing.
short_description: Sea To Summit Insect Shield(R) Bug pants and socks create a barrier to block biting insects so you can enjoy all your outdoor activities.
